class.name: BinaryChromosome

javadoc.text: Chromosome represented by a vector of 0s and 1s.

javadoc.param: representation list of {0,1} values representing the chromosome
javadoc.throws: InvalidRepresentationException iff the representation can not represent a valid chromosome

javadoc.param: representation array of {0,1} values representing the chromosome
javadoc.throws: InvalidRepresentationException iff the representation can not represent a valid chromosome

javadoc.text: Returns a representation of a random binary array of length length.
javadoc.return: a random binary array of length length
